game_description: Hammer Time is a VR Platformer in the fast, fun, colorful style of the classics we all remeber. Hammer Time is a randomly generated VR Platformer. Use your hammer to destroy the robot invaders and collect all the gems from the worlds to open the gate. Hammer Time is a blast to play and a challenge to master. Use your gems to unlock all 12 hammers.
review_1: I was pleasantly surprised with this game. It's like you get a few random Mario 64 worlds to explore, though the levels are pre-made. Just randomly selected in a "gauntlet" of sorts. More levels would be amazing, but the current selection is diverse enough. My only gripe is sometimes the jump doesn't work, mainly when trying to jump from an edge that is rounded or dips. If you die, your gem progress is reset and the levels are changed, which can be frustrating if you die to a jump that didn't activate. But for what there is, it's definitely a steal for the price.
